name: Flipboard
short_description: Flipboard, a digital social magazine, aggregates web links from social networks and displays the content in magazine form on smartphones.
overview: Flipboard is a digital social magazine that aggregates web links from your social circle, i.e. [Twitter](/company/twitter) and [Facebook](/company/facebook), and displays the content in magazine form on an iPad. Headed by Mike McCue, former CEO of Tellme, and Evan Doll, former Senior iPhone Engineer at Apple, Flipboard is on a quest to transform how people discover, view and share content by combining the beauty and ease of print with the power of social media.
